room_title: Escape room "Conjurer's Dungeon" by Conundrum Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: They were very friendly, helpful and enthusiastic. The room was really well designed, just challenging enough! We would go back.

room_title: Escape room "Conjurer's Dungeon" by Conundrum Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: This was my first "escape room" and it was great, I immediately wanted to go to the next room but unfortunately it was already booked!  The staff was very friendly and helpful and definitely engaged.  I'm looking forward to going back.

room_title: Escape room "Conjurer's Dungeon" by Conundrum Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: The owners of Conundrum Escapes have done a great job with their Escape rooms.  There are 2 rooms to choose from: Conjurer's Dungeon and Airship Legacy.  We chose the Dungeon and had a great time.  Since it was supposed to be a dungeon there weren't a lot of big items there which meant you had to search harder for the clues.  As with most escape rooms, you can ask for clues from the game master if you get stumped.  A really great way to spend time with friends.  Looking forward to going back.
